tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE growth_stages ( 
    stage_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    crop_id INT, 
    stage_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    days_to_complete INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crop_types (crop_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE irrigation_planning ( 
    planning_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    crop_id INT, 
    date_id INT, 
    stage_id INT, 
    irrigation_notes TEXT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crop_types (crop_id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (date_id) REFERENCES planting_dates (date_id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (stage_id) REFERENCES growth_stages (stage_id) 
 );
